name: "A Very Special Family Guy Freakin Christmas" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who's the President of the Quahog Chamber of Commerce?
questions.explanation:
Cleveland.

	Because of his status, Cleveland announces a thank you to the senior citizens of Quahog who decorate the large Christmas tree in the center of town.

questions.text: The Griffins are invited to Joe and Bonnie's for what drink?
questions.explanation:
Eggnog.

	Joe is very sad at this time of year because Christmas Eve was the night he lost the use of his legs.

questions.text: Who becomes the designated driver on December 23rd?
questions.explanation:
Peter.

	Peter gets angry because he's the only one not drinking, so he accidentally gives all of the family's presents to "Toys for Toddlers".

questions.text: What did Peter originally get for Christmas?
questions.explanation:
A VCR.

	Peter gives away the presents to a needy family and tries to get them back.  Lois is irritated, but she isn't too mad about it.

questions.text: For what does Stewie ask Santa for Christmas?
questions.explanation:
Plutonium.

	Stewie asks for plutonium, but Santa says he'll only get it if he's good, so Stewie vows to be good until the time comes.

questions.text: What does NOT happen when Brian is left home alone?
questions.explanation:
The presents burn.

	Since Peter gave all of the presents away, there were no presents to burn.  The family comes home to a disaster area.

questions.text: What animals begin to eat Peter in the mall?
questions.explanation:
Fish.

	An old lady is fighting for the same berets that Peter wants for Meg and throws fish food onto Peter.  Although Peter thinks nothing will happen, many tiny fish jump onto Peter and begin eating him.

questions.text: What item goes missing, making Lois go insane?
questions.explanation:
Paper towels.

	Lois soon goes mad, telling everyone about how they expect someone else to do everything for them, and Meg finds the paper towels in the den.

questions.text: What does Brian get for Christmas?
questions.explanation:
A book.

	Although the present was wrapped in the shape of a wine bottle, Brian unwrapped a book and was quite surprised.

questions.text: Does Stewie get his gift from Santa?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Although Stewie doubted that Santa was real, Stewie still got what he wanted.  Lois ended up tranquilized and Peter got his VCR and a copy of "KISS Save Santa".
